Deliverables Due 12/9

"Each team will need to create a code repository at https://github.com for their team project. The link to the repository should be posted to the Slack Workspace TACC-Learn in the #2022_bigdatahack channel prior to your presentation.

The Github repo should include:
  * Source Code
  * README.md with Team Name and Team Members
  * Presentation in PDF form with
  - Team Name
  - Team Members
  - Question Posed
  - Findings with Visualizations"

Speakers: Sofía Ulloa & Ana Paola Mora Murillo

14:45 – 15:00 Beak

def group_name

  • [Problem]
    • Rate_vaccine analysis
  • [Intervention]
    • Create a attribute to person (rate_vaccine)
    • Calculated the rate_vaccine to each person
    • Determine the rate_infection with rate_vaccine
  • [Goal(s)]
    • ¿Cuáles son los objetivos de su grupo?
    • Determine the person’s rate_vaccine
    • Show the rate_infection of population

Resources

  • Designsafe-CI - https://www.designsafe-ci.org
  • SC22 SIR Example Code [Github] - https://github.com/HackHPC/StudentHackatSC22/tree/master/SC22-hack
  • Supercomputing22 - https://sc22.supercomputing.org
  • HackHPC - http://hackhpc.org
  • Texas Advanced Computing Center - https://www.tacc.utexas.edu
  • Center for Desease Control - https://www.cdc.gov
  • SIR (susceptible(S), infectious(I), and recovered or removed (R)) Model - https://www.sciencedirect.com/topics/mathematics/sir-model
  • (SciPython) The SIR epidemic model - https://scipython.com/book/chapter-8-scipy/additional-examples/the-sir-epidemic-model
  • R. M. Anderson and R. M. May, Infectious Diseases of Humans: Dynamics and Control, OUP (1992) - http://www.amazon.co.uk/Infectious-Diseases-Humans-Dynamics-Publications/dp/019854040X
  • Project Jupyter | JupyterHub - https://jupyter.org/hub
  • Individual Hospital Statistics for Texas - https://www.ahd.com/states/hospital_TX.html
  • Example Hospitalization Rates Pre-Vaccine - https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/volumes/69/wr/mm6915e3.htm
  • Death Rates between Vaccinated and Unvaccinated - https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/volumes/71/wr/mm7104e2.htm#T1_down
  • Mask Effectiveness - https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/volumes/71/wr/mm7106e1.htm
  • Deep Uncertainty Presentation - https://toolkit.climate.gov/content/decision-making-under-deep-uncertainty
  • (EMAWorkBench) Fuzzy Logic Machine Learning Python Library - https://emaworkbench.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
